why won't freenode accept a SSL connecti: The current ircd, Hyperion, does not support SSL connections. But ircd-seven (currently under development) will. Further questions in #freenode, please.
The officially assigned TCP port is 22, but it's changeable.

X is usually running on Ctrl-Alt-F7, the seventh console.
GNOME is the desktop environment. It uses X to draw the panels, icons and so on.

Compiz is a window manager, it is responsible for putting windows on your screen (and doing all the effects). CompizConfig-settings-manager is a program that allows editing Compiz settings and enabling effects.
